title: Phil Coulson
summary: Phillip J. Coulson (/ˈkoʊlsən/ KOHL-sən) is a fictional character portrayed by Clark Gregg in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. In the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU), he is depicted as a high-ranking member of the espionage agency S.H.I.E.L.D., and has appeared in several forms in media, being integrated into the mainstream Marvel Universe. In Marvel Comics, he is depicted as a former S.H.I.E.L.D. agent, later becoming the supervillain servant of the demon Mephisto.
